public class Checksum
extends AntTask<org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Checksum>

Used to create or verify file checksums.

public Checksum setAlgorithm(java.lang.String val)

setPattern

public Checksum setPattern(java.lang.String val)
Specify the pattern to use as a MessageFormat pattern.

{0} gets replaced by the checksum, {1} by the filename.
